entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Iqaluit
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:21 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -30.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Iqaluit Airport 6:00 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
Condition: Drifting Snow
Temperature: -30.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 69 %
Wind Chill: -47
Dewpoint: -34.4°C
Wind: NNW 34 km/h gust 48 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 37.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h. Low minus 37. Wind chill minus 46 this evening and minus 54 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 33.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 30 km/h. High minus 33. Wind chill minus 55 in the morning and minus 50 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
